content:
As a lawful good character, Legolas is honorable and just. They are dedicated to upholding the law and doing what is right, even at great personal cost. They are trustworthy and reliable, and they always try to help others.

Now, let's decide on Legolas' background story. Legolas' background can be anything you like, but it should provide some context for their abilities and motivations. Do you have any ideas for Legolas' background story? If not, I can provide some suggestions.
